entry.title: Land Surveyor Maps
entry.summary: The ability to read and use a variety of maps is crucial in land surveying. Land surveyors begin with a large-scale map in order to make a landscape-level plan. After the land surveyor determines the need for specific projects a stand-level map will be required. Two kinds of stand-level maps include: Transportation maps and Topographic maps.
